_description: Database MCP server configurations. Copy the relevant section into your .mcp.json

setup_commands.postgresql: bun run cli/index.ts mcp add postgres --env DATABASE_URL=postgresql://user:pass@host:5432/db -- npx -y @bytebase/dbhub
setup_commands.mysql: bun run cli/index.ts mcp add mysql --env DATABASE_URL=mysql://user:pass@host:3306/db -- npx -y @bytebase/dbhub
setup_commands.sqlite: bun run cli/index.ts mcp add sqlite -- npx -y @anthropic/claude-code-sqlite-server ./db.sqlite
